00044 ObjectImport::ObjectImport(wxString filename)
00045 {
00046         // set true -> file from filesystem
00047         m_AsString = true;
00048 
00049         //set act pointer to null
00050         m_act = NULL;
00051 
00052         // asign filepath
00053         m_path = filename;
00054 
00055         // add filename to m_listFiles
00056         m_listFiles.push_back(filename);
00057 
00058         // create wxFFileInputStream to get filecontent
00059         wxFFileInputStream inFile(filename);
00060 
00061         // string to store filecontent
00062         wxString content;
00063 
00064         // create wxStringOutputStream to store filecontent into string
00065         wxStringOutputStream outStream(&content);
00066 
00067         // read inputstream and store data into outputstream
00068         inFile.Read(outStream);
00069 
00070         // read
00071         read(content);
00072 }

00143 void ObjectImport::read(wxString& content)
00144 {
00145         m_xmin = m_ymin = m_zmin = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00146         m_xmax = m_ymax = m_zmax = -m_xmin;
00147 
00148         //build base wrapper assembly
00149         m_root = new Assembly(wxString(m_path.AfterLast('\\').BeforeFirst('.')));
00150         m_root->setType(IS_OBJECT);
00151 
00152         //create root assembly for object
00153         m_wrapper = new Assembly(wxT("wrapper"));
00154         m_wrapper->setType(IS_WRAPPER);
00155 
00156         //appen root assembly for object
00157         m_root->addPart(m_wrapper);
00158         m_matname = DEFAULT_IMPORT_COLOR;
00159 
00160         //add minimum one assembly, if no g or o occurs
00161         addAtomic("noname");
00162 
00163         // tokenize string
00164         wxStringTokenizer tok(content, wxT("\n"));
00165 
00166         // 1st pass, gather v, vt and vn
00167         while (tok.HasMoreTokens())
00168         {
00169                 m_buf = string(tok.GetNextToken().mb_str());
00170                 if (m_buf.size() < 2)
00171                 {
00172                         continue;
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 switch (m_buf[0])
00176                 {
00177                 case 'v':
00178                         getVs();
00179                         break;
00180                 default:
00181                         break;
00182                 }
00183         }
00184 
00185         // 2nd pass, gather f, o, g and all the rest
00186         tok.SetString(content, wxT("\n"));
00187         while (tok.HasMoreTokens())
00188         {
00189                 m_buf = string(tok.GetNextToken().mb_str());
00190                 if (m_buf.size() < 2)
00191                 {
00192                         continue;
00193                 }
00194 
00195                 switch (m_buf[0])
00196                 {
00197                 case 'f':
00198                         getF();
00199                         break;
00200                 case 'g':
00201                         getO();
00202                         break;
00203                 case 'o':
00204                         getO();
00205                         break;
00206                 case 'u':
00207                         getU();
00208                 default:
00209                         break;
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 
00213         //scale factor 1.0 instead of scale, if glScalef before glTranslatef in assembly->draw
00214 
00215         // calc x, y, z offsets
00216         m_offsetX = (-1.0*(m_xmax + m_xmin)/2.0);
00217         m_offsetY = (-1.0*(m_ymax + m_ymin)/2.0);
00218         m_offsetZ = (-1.0*(m_zmax + m_zmin)/2.0);
00219 
00220         m_wrapper->setX(-1.0*(m_xmax + m_xmin)/2.0);
00221         m_wrapper->setY(-1.0*(m_ymax + m_ymin)/2.0);
00222         m_wrapper->setZ(-1.0*(m_zmax + m_zmin)/2.0);
00223 
00224         // set normals
00225         m_wrapper->setNormals();
00226 
00227         //set real size and scale of object
00228         m_root->setSize((m_xmax - m_xmin),(m_ymax - m_ymin),(m_zmax - m_zmin));
00229         m_root->setScale(1.0,1.0,1.0);
00230 }
00231 
00232 void ObjectImport::getVs()
00233 {
00234         char c = m_buf[1];
00235         m_buf = m_buf.substr(2, string::npos);
00236         switch (c)
00237         {
00238         case ' ':
00239                 getV();
00240                 break;
00241         case 'n':
00242                 getVN();
00243                 break;
00244         case 't':
00245                 getVT();
00246                 break;
00247         default:
00248                 break;
00249         }
00250 }
00251 
00252 void ObjectImport::getO()
00253 {
00254         string objname;
00255         stringstream ss(m_buf.substr(2, string::npos));
00256         ss >> objname;
00257         addAtomic(objname);
00258 }
00259 
00260 void ObjectImport::addAtomic(string name)
00261 {
00262         m_act = new Assembly(IS_ATOMIC,wxT("part"));
00263         m_act->setName(name);
00264         m_wrapper->addPart(m_act);
00265         m_wrapper->setChildMaterial(m_act, m_matlib.getMaterial(m_matname));
00266 }
00267 
00268 void ObjectImport::minmax(float& min, float& max, float value)
00269 {
00270         if (max < value)
00271         {
00272                 max = value;
00273         }
00274 
00275         if (min > value)
00276         {
00277                 min = value;
00278         }
00279 }

00281 void ObjectImport::getV()
00282 {
00283         float x, y, z;
00284         stringstream ss(m_buf);
00285         ss >> x >> y >> z;
00286 
00287         minmax(m_xmin, m_xmax, x);
00288         minmax(m_ymin, m_ymax, y);
00289         minmax(m_zmin, m_zmax, z);
00290 
00291         Vertex tmp(x, y, z);
00292         m_vertex.push_back(tmp);
00293 }
00294 
00295 void ObjectImport::getVN()
00296 {
00297         float x, y, z;
00298         stringstream ss(m_buf);
00299         ss >> x >> y >> z;
00300 
00301         Vertex tmp(x, y, z);
00302         m_normal.push_back(tmp);
00303 }
00304 
00305 void ObjectImport::getVT()
00306 {
00307         float x, y;
00308         stringstream ss(m_buf);
00309         ss >> x >> y;
00310         TCoord tmp(x, y);
00311         m_tcoord.push_back(tmp);
00312 }
00313 
00314 void ObjectImport::getF()
00315 {
00316         Face face;
00317 
00318         stringstream ss(m_buf.substr(2, string::npos));
00319         string token;
00320         while (ss >> token)
00321         {
00322                 stringstream tmp(token);
00323                 int v[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00324 
00325                 int i = 0;
00326                 while (!tmp.eof())
00327                 {
00328                         tmp >> v[i];
00329                         if (tmp.fail() && !(tmp.bad() || tmp.eof()))
00330                         {
00331                                 tmp.clear();
00332                                 char c;
00333                                 tmp >> c;
00334                                 if (c == '/' && i < 3)
00335                                 {
00336                                         i++;
00337                                 }
00338                         }
00339                 }
00340                 v[0]--;
00341                 v[1]--;
00342                 v[2]--;
00343 
00344                 Vertex *pv = NULL, *pn = NULL;
00345                 TCoord *pt = NULL;
00346                 if (v[0] != -1)
00347                 {
00348                         pv = new Vertex(m_vertex[v[0]]);
00349                 }
00350                 if (v[1] != -1)
00351                 {
00352                         pt = new TCoord(m_tcoord[v[1]]);
00353                 }
00354                 if (v[2] != -1)
00355                 {
00356                         pn = new Vertex(m_normal[v[2]]);
00357                 }
00358                 VNT vnt(pv, pn ,pt);
00359                 face.addVNT(vnt);
00360         }
00361 
00362         if (face.size() >= 3)
00363         {
00364                 m_act->addFace(face);
00365         }
00366 }
00367 
00368 void ObjectImport::getU()
00369 {
00370         stringstream ss(m_buf.substr(6, string::npos));
00371         ss >> m_matname;
00372         m_wrapper->setChildMaterial(m_act, m_matlib.getMaterial(m_matname));
00373 }
